definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: burn (intrans.), hotly pursue (NH id., Aram. [[דְּלַק]], dlap all intrans. burn, kindle; Hiph., Aph. transitive)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[דָּלַקְתָּ]] Ge 31:36; 3 mpl. [[וְדָֽלְקוּ]] consec. Ob:Ob 18; sf. [[דְּלָקֻנִי]] La 4:19; Impf. [[יִדְלַק]] Ps 10:2; Inf. cstr. [[דְּלֽק]] 1Sa 17:53; Pt. act. pl. [[דּׂלְקִים]] Ps 7:14, Pr 26:23; —

burn, [[וְדָֽלְקוּ בָהֶם]] Ob:Ob 18 (fig. of Isr. ravaging among Edomites, ‖[[וַאֲכָלוּם]]; on construction c. [[בְּ]] cf. 2Ki 17:25); also in [[חִצָּיו לְדׂלְקִים יִפְעָָל]] Ps 7:14 his arrows he maketh burning ones (subj. God) RV De Che al.; & [[שְׂפָתַיִם דּׂלְקִים]] Pr 26:23 burning (fervent) lips (opp. [[לֵב רָָע]]).
hotly pursue Ge 31:36 (E; sq. [[אַחֲרֵי]]) 1Sa 17:53 (sq. id.); Ps 10:2, La 4:19 (both sq. acc.)

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. sf. [[יַדְלִיקֵם]] Is 5:11; Imv. [[הַדְלֵק]] Ez Eze 24:10; —inflame, c. acc., subj. wine Is 5:11; kindle obj. [[הָאֵשׁ]] Ez Eze 24:10.
